name: Currency Converter
description: A specialized assistant for currency conversions and exchange rate queries.

skills.name: Get Exchange Rate
skills.description: Get the current or historical exchange rate for a given currency pair. Supports any currency pair and can retrieve rates for specific dates or the latest available rate.
examples: What's the exchange rate from USD to EUR?
Get the current exchange rate for GBP to JPY
What was the USD to CAD exchange rate on 2024-01-15?
